entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
